about.whyMeText: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? Highlight your motivation for professional growth and continuous learning. Emphasise your strong problem-solving skills and passion for coding

skills.ChallengeMeContent: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

testimonial.header: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
testimonial.content1: I had the opportunity to work with Felix on a project and got to know him as a highly reliable, thoughtful, and pleasant person. In the frontend, he impressed with his structured approach, technical understanding, and clearly written code. We’ve stayed in touch even after the project ended – which speaks to how positive the collaboration was.
testimonial.content2: ‘’ He is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code. ‘
testimonial.content3: ‘’ He is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.’’

contact.contacContent: As a frontend developer focused on modern web applications, I’m looking for new challenges and exciting projects. I’d be happy to support your team – feel free to reach out.
contact.agreeContent: I've read the privacy policy and agree to theprocessing of my data as outlined.
contact.name: Yor name
